info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 6:18PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pima, western Cochise and northeastern Santa Cruz Counties through 700 PM MST... At 617 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sonoita, or 20 miles east of Tubac, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Patagonia, Sonoita and Elgin. This includes the following highways... Route 82 between mile markers 20 and 43. Route 83 between mile markers 25 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
